newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-Perrigo raised to strong buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Perrigo raised to strong buy.

text.p: Gruntal & Co said Monday it raised its rating on the shares of over-the-counter health-care products maker Perrigo Co to strong buy from buy, with a one-year price target of $18 a share.
-- Analyst Adam Green said he raised his fiscal year 1998 estimate to $0.70 per share from $0.67 per share, and introduced a fiscal year 1999 estimate of $0.90 a share.
-- The company is well positioned to benefit from the large number of drugs that are currently switching to the over-the-counter market from the prescription market, Green said.

-- Green noted that there is a rising trend towards self-medication, thereby boosting the demand for lower priced over-the-counter drugs. Further, he noted that Perrigo has a 66 percent share of the generic store brand market.
-- Shares of Perrigo rose 1/8 to 13-1/4 in early trade.
